name: RC Fun City
description: RC Fun City is a singleplayer simulation game about radio controlled vehicles. The game is constantly evolving.
minimum_requirements: OS: 32 Bit Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: 2,8 GHZ Dual Core Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: 3D graphics 512 MB VRAM (medium-class) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: required
recommended_requirements: OS: 64 Bit Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: 3,4 GHZ Dual Core Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: 3D graphics 2048 VRAM (medium- or upper-class) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: required
